text: The music style is called for whatever reason 8bit or also chiptune. But infact the NES soundchip was only 4bit except for the dmc channel which could  playback 7bit samples but was barely ever used because of the memory usage.
author: supimen

text:
@masterplusmargarita 

The vast majority of Robot Masters are the good kind of weird, it's part of what makes these games awesome.  Don't forget Dive Man, he's a submarine with legs!  MM6 has the most unusual RMs, purely because they had a theme of humanoid warriors.  Not saying those RMs are bad either.  I happen to think that toads, pharaohs, light bulbs, dinosaur bones, submarines, drills, rings and vaccum cleaners made for a pretty badass Mega Man game.
